price: Huenda tutawafuata wachawi wakiwa wao ndio watakao shinda.
arabic: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ ٱلسَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
footnotes: Wakatangaza matarajio yao ya kushinda wachawi, ili wapate kuthibiti katika dini yao, na pia ndio kampeni ya nguvu na juhudi apate kushindwa Musa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: laʿallanā nattabiʿu al-saḥarata in kānū humu al-ghālibīna
